translationIssues.spanish: The Supreme Court puede declarar una ley inconstitucional después de que sea promulgada, but it cannot veto a bill.
translationIssues.english: The Supreme Court can rule a law unconstitutional after it is enacted, but it cannot veto a bill.

translationIssues.spanish: The Arawak were pueblos indígenas of the Caribbean and South América.
translationIssues.english: The Arawak were indigenous peoples of the Caribbean and South America.

translationIssues.spanish: The Huron (Wyandot) are a tribu nativa americana de la región de los Grandes Lagos.
translationIssues.english: The Huron (Wyandot) are a Native American tribe from the Great Lakes region.

translationIssues.spanish: The Missouri River is the longest river in the Estados Unidos.
translationIssues.english: The Missouri River is the longest river in the United States.

translationIssues.spanish: The Mississippi River is the second-longest river in the Estados Unidos.
translationIssues.english: The Mississippi River is the second-longest river in the United States.

translationIssues.spanish: The Atlantic Ocean is on the East Coast of the Estados Unidos.
translationIssues.english: The Atlantic Ocean is on the East Coast of the United States.

translationIssues.spanish: The Indian Ocean does not border the Estados Unidos.
translationIssues.english: The Indian Ocean does not border the United States.

translationIssues.spanish: The Arctic Ocean borders the northern coast of Alaska.
translationIssues.english: The Arctic Ocean borders the northern coast of Alaska.

translationIssues.spanish: The Pacific Ocean is on the West Coast of the Estados Unidos.
translationIssues.english: The Pacific Ocean is on the West Coast of the United States.

translationIssues.spanish: The Gulf of Mexico is on the southeastern coast of the Estados Unidos.
translationIssues.english: The Gulf of Mexico is on the southeastern coast of the United States.

translationIssues.spanish: The Mediterranean Sea is located between Europe and Africa.
translationIssues.english: The Mediterranean Sea is located between Europe and Africa.

translationIssues.spanish: The statue is located ¿Dónde the Hudson River meets New York Harbor.
translationIssues.english: The statue is located where the Hudson River meets New York Harbor.

translationIssues.spanish: The stars represent the states, not wars.
translationIssues.english: The stars represent the states, not wars.

translationIssues.spanish: This commemorates the adoption de la Declaración de Independencia on July 4, 1776.
translationIssues.english: This commemorates the adoption of the Declaration of Independence on July 4, 1776.

translationIssues.spanish: This is Memorial Day, which honors soldiers who died in military service.
translationIssues.english: This is Memorial Day, which honors soldiers who died in military service.
